name: Apple Picker (yunostivkus)
description:
Apple Picker - Catch if you can!

The game has two modes:

1) Easy - control the basket and catch apples that fall from the tree. The main thing is to keep up substitute the basket!

2) Difficult - control the basket and catch apples that fall from the tree and the cube of foliage. Fruits fall at different speeds and are at different heights, as well as move independently of each other.

Challenge yourself and catch all the apples!
